attributes.additional_details: Wouldn't it be great to only have to travel as far as Maidstone to go ice skating, Gillingham just seems to far and to much hastle just for a few hours of skating. With the petition I would like to try and get an Ice Skating rink put into the Maidstone area, bringing the local community together, more people can have new hobbies or improve what they already have, it would be a great job boost aswell.
